column4: im having problems getting an external to work in 8.10. when i plug it in i get no on screen 'connect external monitor?' dialog and theres no options when i goto the screen settings/resolution screen to add a monitor. any ideas where i can start to get it connected?
ATI Radeon HD 3200 Graphics RS780M, specs are here: http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/document?docname=c01631353&lc=en&dlc=en&cc=us&lang=en&product=3860630
